## CSSBindingDirective class

Enables bindings in CSS.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CSSBindingDirective implements HostBehavior, Subscriber, CSSDirective, BindingDirective 
```
**Implements:** [HostBehavior](../fast-element.hostbehavior/)<!-- -->, [Subscriber](../fast-element.subscriber/)<!-- -->, [CSSDirective](../fast-element.cssdirective/)<!-- -->, [BindingDirective](../fast-element.bindingdirective/)
